allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Add graceful fallback for physics engine loading

Fix rendering issue where CANNON physics library timing caused blank page.
Add checks for CANNON availability throughout the code with graceful fallbacks:

- Check if CANNON is defined before creating physics world
- Wrap all physics body creation in CANNON availability checks
- Add fallback floating animation for orbs when physics unavailable
- Protect click handlers from physics errors
- Store baseY, floatSpeed, floatOffset for non-physics animation

Orbs now render and animate properly even if cannon-es fails to load,
ensuring the page always displays correctly.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
debug: Add error handling and console logging

Add try-catch block and console logs to debug rendering issues:
- Move imports to top level \(can''t be in try-catch\)
- Wrap scene initialization in try-catch  
- Add console logs for debugging
- Display error message on page if scene fails to load

This will help identify what''s preventing the Three.js scene from rendering.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
